text: is a Japanese airport that is in Chiba, near Tokyo.Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, and Transport (MLIT), Narita International Airport; retrieved 2012-1-20. It is one of the two primary airports in the Tokyo region.Most international flights pass through Narita Airport. Almost all domestic flights to and from Tokyo pass through Tokyo International Airport which is also known as Tokyo Haneda. The airport is east of Tokyo Station and east-southeast of Narita Station in the city of Narita in Chiba Prefecture. == Related pages == * List of airports in Japan ==References== == Other websites == * Narita International Airport ; Category:Airports in Japan Category:Buildings and structures in Tokyo Category:Chiba Prefecture
title: Narita International Airport
